ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Great course. I would reccomend it for its extensive coverage in mathematical techniques and macroeconomic models.
Depends on students need. Great class for deeper understanding of macroeconomic tools.

Recommendable. Nice introduction into topics of consumption and growth in Macroeconomics. A lot of work and reading but the topic is rewarding in the sense that the questions (partially) answered are of considerable and obvious import for all nations on the globe.
I suppose you have to take it.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Important first insights into the way of thinking, the types of problems and the tools used in modern Macroeconomics. Personally this opened up a new area of interest for me that I could well imagine to be part of my research agenda/disseration in the years ahead.
It gave me quite a lot of knowledge, but pretty sure I'll never use it.
